targets.rawSql: SELECT free_space FROM backup_stats WHERE id=1
SELECT battery_state FROM tado_device_info WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT time FROM admin_timestamp WHERE key='LAST_STARTUP_TIME'
SELECT extract(epoch from (now() - last)) FROM backup_stats WHERE id=1
select time, (number_known-number_on_line) as offline, number_on_line as online from smart_plug_status where $__timeFilter(time) order by time
select time, success::Integer, (not success)::Integer as failed from eneco_stats where $__timeFilter(time) order by time
SELECT inside_temperature, "time" FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT humidity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT inside_temperature, "time" FROM shelly WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT humidity_percentage FROM shelly WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT outside_temperature FROM tado ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT solar_intensity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT setting_temperature FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heating_power_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT inside_temperature as woonkamer, outside_temperature as buiten, heating_power_percentage, "time" FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT inside_temperature as badkamer, "time" FROM shelly WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT "time", solar_intensity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT humidity_percentage as badkamer, "time" FROM shelly WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT humidity_percentage as woonkamer, "time" FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC

select
    min(time)::date as time,
    max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) +
    max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh) as "2024"
    from electricity
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now()) - 1
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
    max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) +
    max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh) as "2025"
    from electricity
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time) AS day,
  name,
  SUM(delta_kwh) as wh
FROM smart_plug
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY day, name
ORDER BY day, name;

with totals as
    (select min(time)::date as day,
           (max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) +
            max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh)) * 1000 as totaldaypower
    from electricity
    where $__timeFilter("time") 
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
    )
  , smart as
     (select min(time)::date as day,
             name,
             sum(delta_kwh) as power
      from smart_plug
      where $__timeFilter("time") and (name != 'Marantz Versterker')
      group by name, extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
)

select smart.day, name, power/totaldaypower as "%"
from totals inner join smart on totals.day = smart.day
order by 1
;

with totals as
    (select min(time)::date as day,
           (max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) +
            max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh)) * 1000 as totaldaypower
    from electricity
    where $__timeFilter("time") 
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
    )
  , smart as
     (select min(time)::date as day,
             sum(delta_kwh) as power
      from smart_plug
      where $__timeFilter("time") and (name != 'Marantz Versterker')
      group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
)

select smart.day, power/totaldaypower as "%"
from totals inner join smart on totals.day = smart.day
order by 1
;

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) AS day,
  name,
  SUM(delta_kwh) as power
FROM smart_plug
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY day, name
ORDER BY day, name;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       max(water_m3) - min(water_m3) as "2024"
FROM water
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now()) - 1
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       max(water_m3) - min(water_m3) as "2025"
FROM water
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       max(heath_gj) - min(heath_gj) as "2024"
FROM heath
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())-1
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       max(heath_gj) - min(heath_gj) as "2025"
FROM heath
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       avg(outside_temperature) as "2024"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())-1
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       avg(outside_temperature) as "2025"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       avg(inside_temperature) as "2024"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())-1
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       avg(inside_temperature) as "2025"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       sum(sunny_minutes) as "2024"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())-1
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       sum(sunny_minutes) as "2025"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date as time,
       sum(call_for_heat) as "2024"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())-1 
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time)::date - INTERVAL '1 years' as time,
       sum(call_for_heat) as "2025"
FROM tado_hour_aggregate 
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) as power_normal_kwh,
       max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh) as power_offpeak_kwh
FROM electricity
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time),extract(hour from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       1000*(max(water_m3) - min(water_m3)) as water_m3
FROM water
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time),extract(hour from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       sum(delta_gj) as delta_heath_gj
FROM heath
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time),extract(hour from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) as normal_kwh,
       max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh) as offpeak_kwh
FROM electricity
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       1000*(max(water_m3) - min(water_m3)) as water_m3
FROM water
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time)
order by time;

SELECT min(time) as time,
       max(heath_gj) - min(heath_gj) as heath_gj
FROM heath
    where $__timeFilter(time)
group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time),extract(day from time)
order by time;
SELECT "time", power_normal_kwh FROM electricity ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", power_offpeak_kwh FROM electricity ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", water_m3 FROM water ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", heath_gj FROM heath ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1

select
    min(time)::date as time,
    min(power_offpeak_kwh) as laag
    from electricity
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as time,
    min(power_normal_kwh) as hoog
    from electricity
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as time,
    min(water_m3) as water
    from water
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as time,
    min(heath_GJ) as warmte
    from heath
    where extract(year from time) = extract(year from now())
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    max(power_normal_kwh) - min(power_normal_kwh) as normal_kwh,
    max(power_offpeak_kwh) - min(power_offpeak_kwh) as offpeak_kwh
    from electricity
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;
